Today in County Sligo, surf is looking decent with 4 ft @ 8s WNW swell and fresh 16 mph SSW winds. Strandhill and Easkey Right are your best bets, with Strandhill offering a solid window from 08:49 to 16:36. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 6 ft @ 11s NNW swell and lighter 11 mph WNW winds, making for a fun day at spots like Dunmoran Strand and Easkey. Day after, the swell drops to 5 ft @ 10s NNW but with fresh 19 mph S winds, leading to blown-out conditions. Best: tomorrow.
